message: I'm feeling generous this round, Bob. Take 1000 and let's get this over with!
I'm feeling generous this round, Alice.  Let's split it 90/10, and we can both get out of this game with something.
Okay, Bob, let's try this again.  I'll take a bit less this time, but I need a better deal than that 10% you offered.  Let's split it 85/15. We both get more this way!
